main event: Strange flying objects were reported in the skies over at least 11 Indiana towns between 12:10 a.m. and 2:40 a.m. on August 7, 1957.
interesting points: Objects were described as brightly lit, changing colors, and moving at high speeds., A policeman reported seeing a round object with a red light in the center traveling at 500 m.p.h., The Greenwood police car reported a close encounter with one of the objects that emitted a blinding light., Residents from multiple towns made reports independently indicating widespread sightings., Local police stated that the objects resembled jet aircraft but had movement characteristics consistent with unidentified flying phenomena.
sighted object: unidentified flying objects with bright lights
witness description: Residents and police officers across several Indiana towns
